title: Did counsel say about Kinosha's alleged shooting that he would be known to start the Second Revolutionary War?
subtitle: The differences between April 18, 1775, "Audible shot around the world" and August 2020 killed two people in a massive police brutality protest in Wisconsin.
author: Jessica Lee
vclaim: :: Attorney John Pierce, representing 17-year-old Kyle Rittenhouse, said in his client's tweet that he would "fall in history" to start the Second Revolutionary American War.
